description: If you like to drink after dinner, Mexicocoa is the perfect way to end your meal. Made with&nbsp;Kahlua and&nbsp;tequila, it is definitely an adult drink. Using Kahlua and tequila gives this drink a lot of flavors, and the cinnamon makes it right for a cold day. Since the two liquors are from Mexico, it is called Mexicocoa.
name: Mexicocoa
